dao

类 TextDao

  • java.lang.Object
    • dao.TextDao

  • public class TextDao
extends java.lang.Object

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      (专用程序包) org.sql2o.Sql2o sql2o 

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      TextDao()
      This method will construct a sql2o frame to connect the sqlite database.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      java.lang.String[] Compare(java.lang.String k1, java.lang.String k2)
      The compare method will get the context from the database and return to the TextService.handleCompare(analyst).If there is no such string it will return null.
      boolean Delete(java.lang.String key)
      This method is will return whether the chosen file is deleted from the database.
      java.lang.String Download(java.lang.String key, java.lang.String path)
      This method will return a String to describe the result of the action(null for no such file, "Can't find the file output path."
      boolean Exists(java.lang.String key)
      This method will return a boolean to claim whether the file exists in the database.
      boolean Insert(java.lang.String key, java.lang.String text)
      This method will return a boolean to claim whether the file already exists in the database.
      java.util.List<DocumentAbstract> List()
      This method will get a list of the files from the database now, and return it back to the TextService.

    • 字段详细资料

      • sql2o

        org.sql2o.Sql2o sql2o

    • 构造器详细资料

      • TextDao

        public TextDao()
        throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        This method will construct a sql2o frame to connect the sqlite database.
        抛出:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - When can not find the class of sqlite

    • 方法详细资料

      • Compare

        public java.lang.String[] Compare(java.lang.String k1,
                                  java.lang.String k2)
        The compare method will get the context from the database and return to the TextService.handleCompare(analyst).If there is no such string it will return null.
        参数:
        k1 - The md5 code for the first file
        k2 - The md5 code for the second file
        返回:
        the context of tow files

      • Delete

        public boolean Delete(java.lang.String key)
        This method is will return whether the chosen file is deleted from the database.(True for success, False for no such file in the database)
        参数:
        key - The md5 code of the target file.
        返回:
        A boolean to claim whether the file is successfully deleted

      • Download

        public java.lang.String Download(java.lang.String key,
                                 java.lang.String path)
        This method will return a String to describe the result of the action(null for no such file, "Can't find the file output path." for illegal download path)
        参数:
        key - The md5 code for the file.
        path - The download path of this file.
        返回:
        A String to describe the result of the action

      • Exists

        public boolean Exists(java.lang.String key)
        This method will return a boolean to claim whether the file exists in the database.
        参数:
        key - The md5 code of the checked file.
        返回:
        a boolean to claim whether the file exists in the database.

      • Insert

        public boolean Insert(java.lang.String key,
                      java.lang.String text)
        This method will return a boolean to claim whether the file already exists in the database.(True for no repetition)
        参数:
        key - The md5 code of the uploaded file
        text - the context of the uploaded file
        返回:
        A boolean to claim whether the file already exists in the database.

      • List

        public java.util.List<DocumentAbstract> List()
        This method will get a list of the files from the database now, and return it back to the TextService.
        返回:
        A list containing the DocumentAbstract
        另请参阅:
        DocumentAbstract
